Shokaract rolls up. He aims his big bad gattling gun thing at the Maximal C=
ity, and wordlessly fires the 3 missiles from it at the City. (Since he has=
 3 barrels on his gun, I believe firing 3 missiles should be okay)

  -----=
 Original Message ----- 
  From: Testifier: Abyssian Badass 
  To: nbwrpg@y=
ahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, September 08, 2001 11:51 AM
  Subject: De=
cepticons, Come Here and Kick Ass!


  OOC:  Hmm, now, if we had Abominus, =
Surgital, AND Menasor at Maximal
  City............*hint hint!!!!!*

  ::Bo=
dicons/Skullgrin/Triggerhappy/Jume/Whee/Quatro/Hakibuscon::

  The Bodicons=
 arrived at the Maximal Base(and Shokaract shouldn't be too far
  behind, R=
oland, get him over here!).

  "Booyah!" Decapitron shouted.

  "Attack!" T=
riggerhappy ordered.

  Decapitron nodded, then he and his troops went arou=
nd spreading out around
  the front, to help Blindfear, Skullgrin, Jume, an=
d Whee.  Decapitron shot a
  plasma saw blade at Maximal City.  Headshot, f=
rom a distance, sprayed a few
  sniper shots at Maximal City.  Gutclaw, bei=
ng a close-combat warrior, had
  some trouble, not too much though.  He kep=
t running and dodging shots from
  the defense.  He went over by Skullgrin =
and fired some pistol shots from a
  pistol,(duh) he found.  Legtrap shot a=
 special net-shield thingies and they
  made slightly protective barriers a=
round all the Decepticons attacking.
  Then, Legtrap fired a missile at Max=
imal City.  Explobody, who was now
  loving it already, fired some grenades=
 at Maximal City, after all, he wasn't
  called Explobody for nothing, he w=
as demolitions all the way!
  ~~~~~~~~~
  Skullgrin transformed into tank m=
ode and fired some blasts at Maximal City.
  ~~~~~~~~
  Triggerhappy contin=
ued to hide and wait for more reinforcements.
  ~~~~~~~~~
  Jume and Whee s=
hot some more blasts at Maximal City.
  ~~~~~~~~~
  Quatro heard the attack=
ers and the announcement, and got his phase-disruptor
  rifle ready to kick=
 some Decepticlown butt.  He headed for the entrance...
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
 =
 Hakibuscon, who happened to be roaming around Africa, saw the attack.

  "=
I'll help them......I must kill Quatro, as well," he said, secretly from
  =
nowhere firing a shot from a fusion cannon at Maximal City.



   

  Your =
use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
